posts.title: New gadgets from x-mini
posts.content: x-mini has shown two new gadgets at the xmi conference in Madrid. The x-range speaker is a high power speaker reaching 150 db, the speaker-watch is a small speaker to wear and may be connected to a smartphone by Bluetooth.
posts.author: Jian Gaso

posts.title: Microsoft gives up producing smartphones
posts.content: Not billions of dollars will help to enter a market, if a system is not open. Microsoft had no chance to enter the smartpone market. Anroid and iOS are too dominant. Maybe Microsoft will change the strategy now in direction of a open system?
posts.author: Leila Garner
